# delegate

**Instance Property**

A custom object you use to manage interactions with an open or save panel.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any NSOpenSavePanelDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Responding to User Interactions

- **NSOpenSavePanelDelegate**: A set of methods for managing interactions with an open or save panel.
